channel.title: Comments on: iOS Messages Feature Request

item.title: By: josephscott
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2019/02/26/ios-messages-feature-request/#comment-143242">Simon Wheatley</a>.
If I had to pick just one, that would certainly be it.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Simon Wheatley.

If I had to pick just one, that would certainly be it.
